articles.title: Gibraltar votes to ease tough abortion laws - BBC News
articles.description: Referendum results show support for lifting the rules, which are some of the harshest in Europe.
articles.content:
image captionSome 62% of voters backed an easing of the territory's strict abortion rules
Gibraltar voted to relax its tough anti-abortion laws in a referendum on Thursday.
The tiny British territo… [+3078 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: UK carrier EE introduces EU roaming charges following Brexit - The Verge
articles.description: UK carrier EE is reintroducing roaming charges for customers traveling to EU countries from January next year. Customers will be charged a flat fee of £2 (around $2.78) a day while in 47 “European destinations.”
articles.content:
New fees will come into force in January 2022
Photo by Belinda Jiao/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
UK carrier EE is introducing roaming charges for customers traveling to almost all EU co… [+1948 chars]

articles.title: UEFA says scrapping away goals rule in all European club competitions - beIN SPORTS MENA Breaking News
articles.description: UEFA said Thursday it was scrapping the away goals rule for all of its club competitions from next season.
articles.content:
Introduced in 1965, the rule was used to determine the winner of a two-legged knockout tie in cases where the two teams had scored the same number of goals on aggregate over the two matches.
From th… [+1299 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: France top group, Portugal squeeze into last 16 after 2-2 draw - CNA
articles.description: Two penalties from Cristiano Ronaldo helped holders Portugal squeeze into the last 16 of the European Championship after a 2-2 draw with France on Wednesday in a dramatic conclusion to Euro 2020 Group F.
articles.content: BUDAPEST: Cristiano Ronaldo kept Portugal alive in Euro 2020 with two penalties to cancel out a brace from France's Karim Benzema in an enthralling 2-2 draw that sent both sides into the last 16 in a… [+2100 chars]
